document_data.name: Tharmakkas IV
document_data.mainbody: '''Tharmakkas IV''' was the king of [[Murghôm]] in [[1359 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Tharmakkas was a senile old man.
document_data.Activities:
Ever since Murghôm's failed incursions into [[Semphar]] during the [[First Great Reclamation|First]] and [[Second Great Reclamation]]s, Tharmakkas was obsessed with defeating his neighbor.

He spent all of his time and money bolstering Murghôm's military by hiring mercenaries and building defenses, especially in [[Port Ghaast]]. He cared for little else.
